newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - RF Monolithics upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - RF Monolithics upgraded.

text.p: -- Robertson, Stephens and Co analyst Dan Niles said he raised his rating on RF Monolithics Inc to buy from market performer.
-- Niles raised his fiscal 1997 earnings estimate for the company to $0.50 per share from $0.45. He also provided an initial estimate of $0.65 for the fiscal year to the end of August 1998.
-- "We believe we have finally reached a period of sustained business momentum for the company," Niles said in a research report.

-- "As business trends continue to improve, we believe the stock could trade at 22 to 25 times our calendar 1998 estimate of $0.68, leading to a $15 to $17 price target over the next 12 months," he wrote.
-- The stock was 15/16 higher at 10-9/16 in late trading on Wednesday.
